動物用藥品名稱: 夏菲特雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎活毒混合疫苗(VH株 + H120株)
業者名稱: 台灣拜耳股份有限公司
效能(適應症): 預防雞隻感染雞新城病及傳染性支氣管炎。
ingredients: Newcastle Disease Virus (VH Strain)…at least 10^6.0 EID50Infections Bronchitis Virus (H120 Massachusetts Type)…at least 10^3.0 EID50Each vial of vaccine contains:Newcastle Disease Virus…0.85ml, Infections BronchitisVirus…0.85ml, Stabilizer*…1.3ml (Lactose – 80.0g/l,alanin - 3.0g/l, mineral salts……8.0g/l)
